best practices. Supporting account management and sales teams in pre-sales and upsell activities.

Positions.JobLevel: Senior Manager (more than 5 years management experience)
Positions.Description:
Customer Success/Implementation Director (SAAS Business)

Supporting and enabling clients to achieve their strategic objectives and improve business
performance. Responsible for providing value across the customer lifecycle to drive software
adoption, ensure renewals and secure expansion and new revenue opportunities. Successful at developing a customer success programme for a small and fast--growing software business, driving and developing the team to implement consistent and best practice processes and implementation
methodologies. Focus on services, customer support and education. Collaborate closely with internal and external stakeholders to deliver cross functional initiatives and solutions.

Freelance Learning & Development Solutions Consultant. Supporting and enabling clients
develop innovative and cost-effective blended learning solutions for corporate and education sectors.

Positions.JobLevel: Senior Manager (more than 5 years management experience)

Providing strategic leadership and management to a restructured L&D team of four learning
advisers/designers. Supporting a new firm--wide business learning strategy for @1,300 staff,
managing a £500,000 budget. Scope, design and implement appropriate blended learning solutions, to support business priority projects and new business development. Extensive internal consulting
to transform the L&D team from cost centre to generator of additional revenue streams via e--learning
programmes offered to legal clients.

The leading specialist music and entertainment retailer across the UK and Eire. Extensive store retail
management before moving into a senior Learning & Development/Training role.

Findings.Message: You should not use the PDF format for your resume. Due to inherent limitations with text extraction from PDFs, you are less likely to get a job when using a PDF resume.

ResumeMetadata.PlainText:
~~~~~~~  
   ~~~~~~~~~~~~  , Hillam, Leeds, UK, LS25 5HZ.    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~  
•    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~   •    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~  


TECHNOLOGY SPECIALIST | CLIENT SUCCESS & DELIVERY
Ensure client success deliverables, deploy strategic software solutions, facilitate operational
efficiencies and implement best practices.

10 years+ legal sector/domain experience and 5 years+ account management/client success
specialist for market leading software providers to the legal and professional services
sectors.

Recognised by senior executives and colleagues as a builder of great trusted relationships with
clients, from execs to middle management to end users.
Experienced in improving business performance and driving adoption of software solutions to ensure
client satisfaction, retention and expansion.

Ability to combine process and project management skills with strong communication, coaching and
facilitation skills, using empathy to understand and solve client problems and achieve strategic
outcomes. Competent and experienced in delivery/implementation of marketing and collaboration
solutions in complex and rapidly changing environments.

Creative problem solver and change agent for delivering scalable and cost--effective enterprise and
platform wide software solutions.
Able to oversee multi--disciplinary groups, facilitating crucial company transformation and completing
complex projects in time--sensitive settings.
Self-starter able to consistently meet project deadlines, solving client problems, managing multiple
stakeholders, generate new revenue opportunities, resolving business--critical issues and leading
cross--functional groups and teams.

•Client relationship management •Strategy execution
•Full project & client lifecycle management
• Executive and stakeholder relationships • Facilitation & training
• Organisational development & change management • Presentation skills
• Enterprise B2B software solutions • Consulting • SAAS
•Marketing technology expertise
• Business process improvements • Service delivery

best practices. Supporting account management and sales teams in pre-sales and upsell activities.
